member.name: M:Syncfusion.Windows.Gauge.Olap.OlapCircularGauge.AddDangerRange(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Adds the danger range according to the Goal Value (ie., Lesser than Goal Value is considered to be in danger).
member.param: The starting value of the Danger range
The mark is the Goal value(ie., The end value of Danger Range)

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Windows.Gauge.Olap.OlapCircularGauge.AddSaferRange(System.Double)
member.summary: Adds the safer range according to the Goal Value (ie., Greater than Goal Value is considered to be safer).
member.param: The mark is the Goal value
